wikipedia_page.main: Daniel Steven Devine (born 4 September 1997) is an English professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Carlisle United.

response: Dan, Daniel or Danny Devine may refer to:
* Danny Devine (footballer, born 1992), Irish professional footballer for Inverness Caledonian Thistle
* Danny Devine (footballer, born 1997), English professional footballer for Carlisle United
